transArray.content: Very satisfied, the room is clean, quiet and not noisy, the front desk has a good attitude. We went to Universal Studios the next day and they provided free shuttle service, which was very considerate. I wish the boss a prosperous business!
Dear guest, thank you very much for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. I wish you fortune, I wish you are loved, and I wish you good luck. I love you, little man.
